37.eng-name: Trials and Fierce Battles (Kitab Al-Fitan Wa Al-Malahim)

hadiths.text: Narrated Sa'd ibn AbuWaqqas: I asked: Messenger of Allah! tell me if someone enters my house and extends his hands to kill me (what should I do?) The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) replied: Be like the two sons of Adam. The narrator Yazid (ibn Khalid) then recited the verse: "If thou dost stretch they hand against me to slay me." [5:]

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي النَّهْىِ عَنِ السَّعْىِ، فِي الْفِتْنَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Participating In The Tribulation
